nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 3 is the third issue of the Star Wars Adventures comic series. The comic was written by Michael Moreci and Shane McCarthy, illustrated by Megan Levens, and released by IDW Publishing. It was published February 3, 2021.
Join the Wookiees of Kashyyyk for part one of a special Life Day celebration! Then, follow Kylo Ren as he learns what it means to be the Supreme Leader of the First Order.
